programme.title: World of Warships Clash of Titans

programme.title: The Dawns Here Are Quiet
programme.desc: It is late spring of 1942, and World War 2 is in full swing. A long way off from the front-line the Germans make an air landing operation in an attempt to get through to the Kirov railway and the White Sea - Baltic Sea Canal. The only obstacle in their way is an anti-aircraft artillery unit of corporal Vaskov and five young women in training.

programme.title: 3 Days in the Life of Lt. Kravtsov
programme.desc: Lt. Kravtsov, a platoon commander, begins his active duty. The odds are against him, as lieutenants typically have only three days to live. Within this time, he must lead his troops in a futile attack, hoping to save the incoming regiment. Can he survive these three days?

programme.title: 3 Days in the Life of Lt. Kravtsov
programme.desc: The weight of unfairness looms over Lt. Kravtsov's fate. The prospect of dying at the tender age of eighteen seems unjust. As he embarks on his mission, the fragility of life and the enormity of his responsibility are inescapable.

programme.title: 3 Days in the Life of Lt. Kravtsov
programme.desc: This story underscores the harsh realities of war and the profound impact it has on young soldiers like Lt. Kravtsov. It raises questions about sacrifice, the fragility of life, and the emotional toll of warfare. Will Lt. Kravtsov defy the odds and survive his assigned three days? The answer remains uncertain in this poignant narrative of youth and the cost of war.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: In this episode, the pilots of a Soviet aviation regiment face challenges during World War II. They engage in combat, search for a downed German pilot, and receive a new recruit. The episode explores the camaraderie and determination of the pilots in the face of adversity.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: The squadron prepares for a mission, mourns a fallen comrade, and faces chaos in the air. Inexperienced pilots break ranks, causing casualties. Personal relationships and inner struggles unfold amidst reprimands. The episode ends with consequences and regret.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: During a battle, a pilot apologizes for leaving his group, but the captain assures him they'll fly together again. Jealousy arises over a pilot's claimed victories, and a dangerous mission to photograph enemy positions leads to intense aerial combat.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: A Russian pilot gets captured by Germans but meets a friendly soldier who offers a chance to defect. The pilot resists at first but ultimately agrees. Meanwhile, back at the Soviet base, plans are made for a daring aerial deception to defeat the Germans. The pilot's loyalties and the success of the mission hang in the balance.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: During WWII, a squadron faces a treacherous airdrome mission. Bordeaux loses film, compromising the op. They celebrate a victory but face danger later. A pilot reveals fatigue and refuses duty. Charged as a coward, he returns home to a different life. War impacts loved ones, and exemptions stir emotions.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: In a prestigious aviation regiment, whispers of suspicion shroud the reputed Sergeant Bestuzhev, whose alleged treason bewilders comrades. Determined to unravel the truth, Pilot Litovchenko is discreetly interrogated about hidden weapons. An intense investigation ensues, focusing on a crucial light plane that could hold the key.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: At an airfield, Ivan, a new recruit, meets Lyudmila, a skilled pilot concealing an ailment. She mentors him as Lenya, the strict trainer, pushes Martynov, a rebellious trainee. When scouts go missing, aerial battles ensue, forging deep bonds, and unveiling secrets. Amidst peril and personal struggles, they find courage, love, and hope.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a man is interrogated for sabotaging a plane with sand. Granny Valya's family is drawn into the situation. Dvina's team plans a mission to attack a division's storehouse. Varka joins technicians to help fight. The story brims with intrigue and intense moments as they face the challenges of war.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: Amidst enemy forces gathering, a Luftwaffe squadron guards above, raising suspicions of troop relocation. A pilot's sacrifice, underwater tanks, and strategists' debates add to tensions. The mission is to destroy the enemy crossing without battles. Pilots reflect on their future amid potential encirclement and lack of aviation devices.

programme.title: The Attackers
programme.desc: Amidst WWII's war-torn skies, Soviet Major Bestuzhev defends the airdrome. A bond forms with comrade Zhenya, but facing overwhelming odds, they must protect their homeland, confronting fears in a narrative of sacrifice, courage, and camaraderie. As the air raid sirens wail, they delve deeper into the turmoil of war, discovering the true essence of duty and the resilience of the human spirit.
